title: Enhancing Visuo-Haptic Coherency by Manipulating Fingertip Contact Tilt
venue: IEEE Conference on Virtual Reality and 3D User Interfaces Abstracts and Workshops (VRW)
authors: **Hiroki Ota**, Yutaro Hirao, Monica Perusquía-Hernández, Hideaki Uchiyama, Kiyoshi Kiyokawa, Maud Marchal

abstract.ja: 指先接触面の傾き操作による視触覚の一貫性向上を検討する。
abstract.en: We investigate improving visuo-haptic coherency by manipulating fingertip contact tilt.
